Upon returning home, your kids jump into the warm outdoor spa to cool off. Your partner goes upstairs to relax in the steam shower, while you suntan on your private roof-top deck. That evening you have some friends over for dinner. Internet Remarks: Featuring heavy timbers, vaulted wood ceilings, expansive windows, and French doors, the living spaces have a view across the lawn past a picturesque barn to a wooded hillside.  The open plan flows from the entry to the ‘island’ kitchen, into the family lounge, and gently turns to the great room with its imposing granite fireplace.  A level entry and main floor owners’ suite offer single level living with an upper owners’ suite . The mudroom opens to a laundry and beyond to the butler’s pantry. The office has an entrance from the patio as well as the house. The stair to the lower level opens to a recreation area with 9-foot ceilings and room for games, a gym, and a lounge area. Entertainment options include a sound-buffered media room and wine closet. The flex room can used as a guest room or fourth bedroom using the  adjacent pool dressing room as a 3-piece ensuite.  This remarkable home is designed for casual comfort and country living with heated, polished concrete floors throughout.
Public Remarks: Heavy timbers, vaulted wood ceilings, and oversize French doors opening to a south-facing patio, sports pool & hot tub. The open plan embraces the patio and living spaces have a view across the manicured lawn past a picturesque barn to a forest backdrop–a private 4-acre park with specimen trees, an 100-year-old orchard, and an acre of private woods. Living areas flow seamlessly from the unique ‘island’ kitchen to an imposing granite fireplace. A level entry and main floor owners’ suite provides for single-level living–or choose the upper owners’ suite and mountain view. The lower level has room for a gym or games room or both, a media room, wine closet, bedroom/flex room, and pool change room round out the entertaining possibilities in this unique property designed for country living.
Realtor Remarks: 24 hour notice to view. Please allow 30 minutes to view home, cottage (legal detached suite), out-buildings, and grounds. Signed COVID waiver and masks required. All areas, measurements, and data are approximate. Buyer to verify. Pool can be salt water and/or heated.

Internet Remarks: A very rare opportunity presents itself on the banks of the Cheakamus River. 1.17 Acres of uniquely zoned land, intended to provide an outdoor recreation school and tourist accommodation facilities is ready to welcome you to the best place on earth! The focal point is undeniably the Cheakamus River that runs parallel to the western lot line. Afternoon sun & evening sunsets that reflect off the waves are truly breathtaking and offer a unique environment that cannot be duplicated anywhere else. The soothing sound of the flowing, clear, blue/green water creates a wonderful ambiance. The treed, flat lot enjoys great sun exposure and privacy is paramount. Intended uses to bring this magnificent piece of land to its highest and best use include; a school, providing instruction in outdoor recreation activities, indoor and outdoor recreation, hostel, retail/commercial, 3 employee dwellings and perhaps most notably the 20,000 sq/ft allowable buildable. Use your imagination - the opportunities are vast and so exciting!
